# bare-events

Event emitters for JavaScript.

```
npm install bare-events
```

## Usage

<<<<<<< HEAD
```js
=======
``` js
>>>>>>> 981e02d8b3161fb3284b6e7416793ef8f82f8915
const EventEmitter = require('bare-events')

const e = new EventEmitter()

e.on('hello', function (data) {
  console.log(data)
})

e.emit('hello', 'world')
```
